name: LowDown: A Social Experiment
description:
Try to out-fox your opponents in this clever number-guessing game!

In each daily or hourly contest, you choose numbers to submit to the game. If you choose the lowest number that nobody else chooses, you win that contest!

Check out the results of previous contests so you can plan your strategy for the next one.

Entirely free and without IAP, this game is supported by banner ads and voluntary video ads.
